headline: Republican unity over President Trump’s immigration tactics has started to splinter, and Trump himself is even starting to hedge. Read more in today’s WSJ Politics newsletter:

Republicans are promoting tax season, reminding voters they’re getting an estimated $100 billion more in refunds this year. Trump and the GOP hope taxpayers return the favor in the midterm elections.
